title: I have $20 on the fact Riot hired a twelve-year-old to write Rakan.
body: I really hope Xayah's dialogue isn't as bland and cringy as Rakan's.

replies.body: Ill take you up on that. You now owe me $20.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UyjlFXzQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-06T23:55:42.401+0000)
>
> Ill take you up on that. You now owe me $20.

Wow! That was about as original as everything that Rakan says.
